Module com.example.platformerplain

Package com.example.platformerplain.view

package com.example.platformerplain.view
Contains all the game screen of the game.

The com.example.platformerplain.view package contains classes that provides the user interface components and visual elements such as End Screen, Info Screen and Main Screen.

This package implements the MVC design patterns and promotes ease of development, maintainability, and scalability as new visual features and enhancements are added to the game.
